mapper.select:
select
from `tbl_tea` tea LEFT JOIN `tbl_dic_2016` dic1 ON tea.`coll_id` = dic1.`val_id` AND dic1.`type` = 'col' LEFT JOIN `tbl_dic_2016` dic2 ON tea.`pro_id` = dic2.`val_id` and dic2.`type` = 'pro' AND dic2.`par_id` = dic1.`val_id` WHERE `tea_id`=#{id}

select from `tbl_tea_class` teaClass LEFT JOIN `tbl_dic_2016` dic1 ON teaClass.`coll_id` = dic1.`val_id` AND dic1.`type` = 'col' LEFT JOIN `tbl_dic_2016` dic2 ON teaClass.`pro_id` = dic2.`val_id` and dic2.`type` = 'pro' AND dic2.`par_id` = dic1.`val_id` LEFT JOIN `tbl_class` cla ON teaClass.`class_id` = cla.`id` left join `tbl_year_dic` dic_year ON teaClass.`year` = dic_year.`year_id` WHERE teaClass.`tea_id` = #{id}

select stu.`stu_id`,stu.`name`,stu.`sex`,stu.`com_year`,stu.`year`,dic1.`name` collName,dic2.`name` proName,stu.`cla_id`,grade.`grade` from `tbl_stu` stu LEFT JOIN `tbl_dic_2016` dic1 ON stu.`coll_id` = dic1.`val_id` AND dic1.`type` = 'col' LEFT JOIN `tbl_dic_2016` dic2 ON stu.`pro_id` = dic2.`val_id` and dic2.`type` = 'pro' AND dic2.`par_id` = dic1.`val_id` LEFT JOIN `tbl_tea_class` teaClass ON teaClass.`coll_id` = stu.`coll_id` AND teaClass.`pro_id` = stu.`pro_id` AND teaClass.`cla_id` = stu.`cla_id` AND teaClass.`stu_year` = stu.`year` LEFT JOIN `tbl_stu_grade` grade ON grade.`stu_id` = stu.`stu_id` AND grade.`class_id` = teaClass.`class_id` where teaClass.tea_id = #{teaId} and teaClass.`class_id` = #{classId}
